channel.title: Home on ht.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in Home on ht.xyz

item.title: [Mahabharat][EPISODE 1, part 1] The story of king Bharat
item.description: Intro This is the first of the many reviews I will be posting of the much loved Mahabharat television series that aired on DD National when I did not even exist.

item.title: [Mahabharat][EPISODE 1, part 2] The wedding of Shantanu
item.description: Recap Last we saw king Bharat establish a new trend of choosing the rules by his merit and not by right of birth. Many years have passed since then,and now we look at another king of Hastinapur, Shantanu.

item.title: Lessons from Hanumanji
item.description: Shri Hanuman is the epitome of selfless service, courage, hope and strength. He is, and should be an inspiration to us all in more that one ways. Even for those who don’t believe in him, his story is one with valuable life lessons.

item.title: Death of a tree
item.description: When a tree dies The wayward souls lose their shade. Their shade is no more, Neither is the cold whistling of the wind which moves the leaves- A lullaby to listening ears

item.title: Mangoes in cardboard boxes
item.description: like alcohol in the stone pits hailed, wanted, but lonely. In limbo, unhinged from reality thinking about the skies, while baffled by morality. I scoured the universe, in search of salvation while my god’s abode was in my soul’s foundation.

item.title: Coding Problems and Solutions
item.description: Instructions This page is a fast, static place to store programming problems and their solutions. Links to problems are marked to the right on computers. To add your own problems and solutions to this page, create a pull request and edit the /content/posts/coding_problems.

item.title: अंतर
item.description: उदासी तुझमें है, तनहाई मेरे भी अंदर है, लोग वही है, समय बस अलग है। काल चक्र का कोई जादू सा मंतर है। कैसे बताऊं मै? कोई अदृश्य अक्षर है। बातें वही है, बस शब्दों में कुछ अंतर है।

item.title: [FIX] ELan touchpad stops working at boot
item.description: There was this issue that I faced in my system (HP Pavilion Gaming 15 Laptop) in which the touchpad (ElanTech) would stop working when the laptop booted, the fix to which was to move my finger on the touchpad when the system was booting up.

item.title: Small Fry
item.description: Universes die. Then what am I? A measly human, a small fry. Life gives and life takes. And the rest of it, death rakes. Civilizations are devoured, Myths forgotten, Languages are lost In the jaws of time.

item.title: First Post
item.description: First Post This is the first post in what I hope will be a long list of many. I’ve always wanted to start a blog. It means I could have a place of my own, a place where my opinions are not owned by anyone else other than me.

item.title: Religion and its reasons
item.description: I was an atheist in the past. It was less because of my personal beliefs and more because all the cool kids did it, but other than that, my religion was liberal in that matter.
